participant_1.background:
I have no siblings, but I have many friends who are like my family.
My family is supportive of my art career and helps me out when I need it.
I enjoy my bike rides with some tunes in my ears.
i take pride in getting straight a s.
i eat a strictly vegan diet.

participant_2.background:
I spend my days reading mystery novels and exploring the mountains, but I usually wake up late.
my favorite music is jim hendrix.
i am a scientist.
my mom lives with me.
I start my day with a hearty stew, inspired by my idol, Thierry Henry.

content.text: Good afternoon! What do you do for fun?
I spend my days reading mystery novels and exploring the mountains.
That sounds like fun! I enjoy bike rides with some tunes in my ears.
That sounds relaxing. I usually wake up late and start my day with a hearty stew.
I love stews! My favorite is chicken and dumplings.
I've never had chicken and dumplings, but it sounds delicious. What kind of music do you listen to?
I like a variety of music, but my favorite is Jim Hendrix.
Oh, I love Jim Hendrix! He's one of my favorites too.
What do you do for a living?
I'm a scientist.
That's awesome! What kind of science do you do?
I study the effects of climate change on the environment.
That's important work. I'm sure you're making a difference in the world.
Thanks, I try.
What's your favorite part about your job?
I love the feeling of discovery. When I find something new, it's like finding a hidden treasure.
That sounds amazing. I bet it's so rewarding.
It is. I'm really lucky to have this job.
It sounds like you're a really passionate person. I'm glad I got to meet you.
Me too. It was nice chatting with you.
